data.title: Salvador Dali "Galatea of the Spheres" Bag
data.meta_description: Fascinating, beautiful and futuristic. Dalí was greatly interested in nuclear physics and described the atom as his "favourite food for thought". The Galatea of the Spheres tote bag is an eloquent act of homage to Gala, his wife. Galatea, a sea nymph in classical mythology. © Salvador Dalí, Fundació Gala-Salvador Dalí
data.text:
Fascinating, beautiful and futuristic. Dalí was greatly interested in nuclear physics and described the atom as his "favourite food for thought". The Galatea of the Spheres tote bag is an eloquent act of homage to Gala, his wife. Galatea, a sea nymph in classical mythology.

© Salvador Dalí, Fundació Gala-Salvador Dalí / VG Bild-Kunst, Bonn 2022

carry 20 kg (44 lbs).

size is 50 x 42 cm (19.7" x 16.5"), zip pocket is 11 .5 x 11.5 cm (4.5" x 4.5")

made using waterless printing on 100% recycled taffeta by GREEN CIRCLE® certified

water resistant

Price: $18.00
